comment:
* A class that represents a fixed view in a list, for example a header at the top
     * or a footer at the bottom.

variables.name: view
variables.comment: The view to add to the list

variables.name: data
variables.comment: The data backing the view. This is returned from {@link ListAdapter#getItem(int)}.

variables.name: isSelectable
variables.comment: true if the fixed view should be selectable in the list
